text: Anthony J. "Tony" Hrkac () (born July 7, 1966 in Thunder Bay, Ontario) is a Canadian professional ice hockey centre currently playing for the Houston Aeros of the AHL. ==Awards and achievements== * Hobey Baker Award (top player in NCAA): 1986–1987 season * Led the IHL in points scored (132) and was named league MVP as a member of the Indianapolis Ice in 1992–93. * Hrkac's #26 was retired by the AHL's
